page.title: 04LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: The area east of the housing estates is a site of major historical intrest. Over the last 20 years the Fengate site has been heavily investigated. A large number of finds and a wealth of evidence has been gathered on the period between Neolithic Times and the Middle Ages.However the whole site has now been bulldozed for industrial development. During this yeara new important site has been discovered on Flag Fen.It istoo soon to know what has really been found except that it appears to be a Bronze Age site.Further work is continuing although this has been hampered by attacks from vandals .
